system.availability: Placing mine requires +20 Tech-Use Test and requires a Grenade or other explosive. Size 3 (Scrawny) or larger creatures within 1,2, or 3 metres of the snare mines cause the grenade to detonate with a delay of 0 to 5 rounds. Detecting a Snare mine before triggering it requires +0 Awareness Test with -10 per Degree of Success on Test to plant it.
